titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on continuous oxidized polyacrylonitrile fiber tow.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on continuous oxidized polyacrylonitrile fiber tow, total measurement of which is 15,000 decitex or greater.
